name: Unfinished Bugness
description:
A Tale of Cold-Blooded Betrayal!

Framed by the Bug Mafia and sent to Bug Prison, Samson "The Meatball" Sylvester is visited by a mysterious figure who is intent on getting rid of him - for good. Presumed to be dead, Samson lives on through a freak accident that allows his soul to pass in and out of his body. Though they are irreversibly joined, together, Samson's soul and shell can do more than any bug could dream of.

Sneak, investigate, and slingshot yourself out of Bug Prison, and find out who's responsible!

Controls

  • [WASD] keys for movement.
  • [E] to interact with doors and read.
  • [Q] to release the soul, and...
  • Hold and release [Space] to slingshot your shell!
  • [R] to restart the level.

Credits

  • Jack - itsjacko - Design, Art, Music, Sound, Programming
  • Rye - ryegleason - Design, Programming
  • Sound effects - freesound.org
  • Music made in Bosca Ceoil, created by Terry Cavanagh
